scripts.clean: rm -rf dist docs tmp_server_fs working_tmp out-* *.zip
scripts.test: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config.js
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run copy
scripts.all: npm run clean   && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.package-mac: npm run build && npx yackage --app-dir $PWD  dist  out-mac
scripts.package-linux: npm run build  && npx yackage --app-dir $PWD   dist  out-linux
scripts.package-win: npm run build  && npx yackage --platform win --arch x64 --app-dir $PWD   dist  out-win
